Title: Deep Inside Image Resizing and scaling with ASP.NET and IIS with ImageResizing.net author Nathanael
Description: Scott sits down with ImageResizing.net author and ASP.NET scalability expert Nathanael Jones. Nathanael educates Scott on the good and bad about manipulating images in .NET. They talk about when to stay out of the managed pipeline and when not to. When do you use ASP.NET and when do you use IIS?
